pre.expressions.pre.expressions: if (filename($L.file)="SurveyDefinition") then ($L.surveyID=template.id in $L.file;$L.fname=tableName in $L.file;$L.uniKeys=jscall("dbdictHelper.getUniqueKey", $L.fname);$L.uniKey=1 in $L.uniKeys;$L.ticketID=$test.record) else ($L.surveyID=$survey.template;$L.fname=filename($L.file);$L.uniKeys=jscall("dbdictHelper.getUniqueKey", $L.fname);$L.uniKey=1 in $L.uniKeys;$L.ticketID=$L.uniKey in $L.file)

if (not (null($L.surveyID))) then ($L.void=rtecall("rinit", $L.rc, $L.survey, "SurveyInternal");if (lng(denull($survey.users))>0) then (contact.name in $L.survey=1 in $survey.users);reference.number in $L.survey=$L.ticketID;file.name in $L.survey=$L.fname;field.name in $L.survey=$L.uniKey;template.id in $L.survey=$L.surveyID;$L.array.names={$L.survey, "SurveyInternal.preview", contact.name in $L.survey, reference.number in $L.survey};$L.array.values={"$L.file", "$L.format", "$L.contactName", "$L.reference"})
